headline.print_headline: FDA Panel Backs Novo Nordisk Injection for Obesity
headline.main: FDA Panel Backs Novo Nordisk Injection for Obesity

docs.lead_paragraph: Federal health experts say a diabetes drug from Novo Nordisk should be approved for a new use in treating obesity.
docs.snippet: Federal health experts say a diabetes drug from Novo Nordisk should be approved for a new use in treating obesity.

docs.abstract: The risks of consuming fructose-rich sodas and processed foods drop substantially if you get up from your chair and move around, even if you don’t formally exercise, two important new studies find.
docs.snippet: The risks of consuming fructose-rich sodas and processed foods drop substantially if you get up from your chair and move around, even if you don’t formally exercise, two important new studies find.

headline.print_headline: Nutrition: Mixed News on Obesity Rates

docs.abstract: In 2013, adult obesity rates rose in six states – Alaska, Delaware, Idaho, New Jersey, Tennessee and Wyoming – which was a drastic shift from 2005, when the rate increased in every state.
docs.snippet: In 2013, adult obesity rates rose in six states – Alaska, Delaware, Idaho, New Jersey, Tennessee and Wyoming – which was a drastic shift from 2005, when the rate increased in every state.

headline.main: Averting Diabetes Before It Takes Hold

docs.abstract: It can take 20 years for complications from diabetes to become apparent, so identifying those at risk and altering their habits could delay onset of the disease.
docs.snippet: It can take 20 years for complications from diabetes to become apparent, so identifying those at risk and altering their habits could delay onset of the disease.

headline.print_headline: Harvard Receives Largest-Ever Gift, $350 Million for Public Health
headline.main: Harvard Receives Largest-Ever Gift, $350 Million for Public Health

docs.lead_paragraph: Harvard University has received the largest donation in its history, the school announced on Monday: $350 million from the Morningside Foundation to the School of Public Health.
docs.snippet: Harvard University has received the largest donation in its history, the school announced on Monday: $350 million from the Morningside Foundation to the School of Public Health.

headline.print_headline: Harvard's Health School Gets Record $350M Gift
headline.main: Harvard's Health School Gets Record $350M Gift

docs.lead_paragraph: Harvard University announced Monday that its school of public health has received a record $350 million donation to support students and bolster research into major global health threats.
docs.snippet: Harvard University announced Monday that its school of public health has received a record $350 million donation to support students and bolster research into major global health threats.

headline.print_headline: Hong Kong Group to Give Harvard’s School of Public Health $350 Million
headline.main: Hong Kong Group to Give Harvard’s School of Public Health $350 Million

docs.abstract: Morningside Foundation, group led by wealthy Hong Kong brothers Ronnie and Gerald Chan, will give $350 million to Harvard University's School of Public Health; gift is largest in university's history.
docs.lead_paragraph: Harvard’s president said the gift by the Morningside Foundation would give the school a stable financial base and the ability to give students more financial aid while expanding programs in several fields.
docs.snippet: Harvard’s president said the gift by the Morningside Foundation would give the school a stable financial base and the ability to give students more financial aid while expanding programs in several fields.
